raw_body: DE SILVA, CHITRIKA (nee FERNANDO) – It is with great sadness we announce the passing of Chitrika de Silva. Beloved wife of late Dr. Srilal de Silva (Sri Lanka Standards Institute SLSI), ever loving mother of Ranga de Silva (son), Radhi de Silva (daughter), Heshani Perera (daughter-in-law) and Rajitha Devapriya (son-in-law). Remains lie at residence No. 49, Jayathilaka Mawatha, Panadura. Cortège leaves the residence at 4.00pm on Wednesday the 13th of September 2023. Cremation at 5.00pm at the Minuwampitiya Cemetery Panadura. 120923
